attributes.action: Abolish the unfair tax burden on female pensioners aged 60-64
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present situation is that, on attaining the legal age for retirement - currently 60 - women are not allowed an enhanced tax allowance. This does not come in until age 65 - the legal age for male retirement.
Currently this means that any income over £5035.00 per annum attracts a tax deduction. Grossly unfair in my opinion.
